operation_rotate_leg.description: Operate the moving leg of the pliers by rotating it.

manipulate_revolute_leg.description: Actively maneuver the movable leg for use.

adjustment_rotate_leg.description: Rotate the adjustable leg to fit the work requirement.

rotate_leg_counterclockwise.description: Rotate the mobile leg of the pliers counterclockwise for loosening.

pick_revolute_leg.description: Lift the mobile leg of the pliers for manipulation.

place_and_rotate_leg.description: Place the leg to the desired position and rotate it for adjustment.

rotate_leg_clockwise.description: Rotate the mobile leg of the pliers clockwise for tightening it.

place_revolute_leg.description: Place the mobile leg to its initial position after manipulation.

rotate_leg.description: Rotate the leg of the pliers for adjustment

pick_leg.description: Pick up the leg of the pliers

place_leg.description: Place the leg to its proper position

clean_fixed_leg_process.description: Clean the stationary leg of the pliers to maintain performance.

manipulate_fixed_leg_process.description: Handle the stationary leg for use.

firm_hold_fixed_leg.description: Apply pressure on the stationary leg for a firm grip.

clean_fixed_leg_with_cloth.description: Wipe the fixed leg of the pliers using a clean cloth to remove any dust.

pick_and_place_fixed_leg.description: Lift up the plier from the fixed leg and then place it back.

press_fixed_leg.description: Press on the fixed leg of the pliers to hold the object firmly.

clean_fixed_leg_surface.description: Wipe the surface of the fixed leg of the pliers to remove any grease or stains.

pick_fixed_leg.description: Pick up the plier from the fixed leg.

clean_fixed_leg.description: Clean the fixed leg of the pliers to remove any dirt or debris.

manipulation_of_both_legs.description: Handle both legs of the pliers for operation.

clean_and_grip_process.description: Proceed with the cleaning of plier and apply pressure on both legs for a firm grip.

overall_cleaning.description: Perform the overall cleaning process on the plier.

pick_and_rotate_both_legs.description: Lift up both legs of the pliers, rotate them and then place them back.

clean_and_press_legs.description: Clean the entire plier, press on both legs to ensure firm grip.

clean_pliers.description: Clean the pliers, both the legs.

pick_and_rotate_leg.description: Pick up the mobile leg of the pliers, rotate it and then place it back.

press_and_pick_leg.description: Press on the fixed leg of the pliers and then lift the plier.

clean_whole_pliers.description: Clean the entire pliers, both the legs.

pick_and_place_leg.description: Pick the revolute leg of the pliers and place it down after adjustment.
